summary: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."
cast: Bill Bailey|Anna Chancellor|Warwick Davis|Yasiin Bey|Zooey Deschanel|Su Elliot|Martin Freeman|Stephen Fry|Richard Griffiths|Dominique Jackson|Simon Jones|Thomas Lennon|Mark Longhurst|Kelly Macdonald|John Malkovich|Ian McNeice|Helen Mirren|Bill Nighy|Steve Pemberton|Alan Rickman|Sam Rockwell|Jack Stanley|Mark Gatiss|Reece Shearsmith|Mak Wilson|Albie Woodington|Mason Ball|Sarah Bennett|Danny Blackner|Hayley Burroughs|Cecily Fay|Aron Freeman|Ian Kay|Nikki Bond|Mohsen Nouri|Oliver Parham|Nigel Plaskitt|Lynn Robertson Bruce|Jerome St. John Blake|Milo Bodrozic|Martin Dawson|Dan Ellis|Steve Grindle|Art Hewitt|Simon Hibbs|Rob Horseman|Mike Lewis|Paul Nathaniel|Tim Perrin|Jessie Riley|Tucker Stevens|Ashley Stuart|Ben Uttley|Patrick Walker|Spencer Wilding|William Wollen|Polly Jane Rocket Adams|Alex Argenti|Jane Belson|Peter Burroughs|Ray Donn|Garth Jennings|Rich Johnston|Zoe Kubaisi|Jim Lynn|Jason Schwartzman|Alisha Smith|Mark Rhino Smith|Sean Sollé|Mark Stevenson|James Thrift|Emma Timms|Susie Valerio|Edgar Wright
title: Guía del autoestopista galáctico
